name: Ontario
startIntroPart2: You, Lieutenant Governor Elizabeth Dowdeswell, are the leader of Ontario.  After winning independence from Canada, you must now lead your nation to prosperity!
declaringWar: You have crossed Ontario one too many times. Now, prepare to be destroyed like the you have. never seen before
attacked: Your army fighting my army is like bringing a knife to a gunfight. After we win the war, you will be exiled, and forced to live away from any civilization, as an outcast.
defeated: We may have fallen, but Canada will still crush you.
introduction: Hello. I am Lieutenant Governor Dowdeswell, of Onatrio.  Would you like to play a game of ice hockey??
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
